title: Blended Learning and Connectivism-Based Social Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Ability to use basic digital tools and intermediate-level expertise in social studies
context.additional_context: Content design optimized for smartphone-based learning environments, organized around field-applicable case studies

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish between three types of blended learning models (rotational/flex) and apply them contextually
Learners can explain how to design digital network-based learning environments grounded in connectivism theory
Learners can develop and evaluate blended learning modules (synchronous/asynchronous activities) executable in a smartphone environment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
